title: After Quarantine, Ebola-Free Dallas Residents Face New Challenges
teaser: In Dallas, the first round of people that came into contact with Ebola victim Thomas Eric Duncan are free from quarantine and trying to get back to their daily lives. But the ordeal has taken a logistical and emotional toll.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
